entry.title: feat(security_features): mod detection version check This feature tells users who are using more recent/latest versions to use earlier versions, because after version 12.81.0.44 (126022), Snapchat now detects changes made to the app
entry.content:
commit beb52174047f08029e3d8cd106cb61deb61714ca parent 574775f65c3790a42d97d45cc2d257d34353addf Author: rhunk <101876869+rhunk@users.noreply.github.com> Date: Sun, 6 Oct 2024 11:43:42 +0200
